From: "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@...>


* Snow Tech smiles at Iron Raptor, she had a new sence of humour, finally. 
He lowered his sheild as she asked him, trusting that she would protect him 
and not gey him killed. He looks at Prowl as he slides his arm around IR,*

<What a imature little heathen! He's worse than me! God, if he wants to play 
games....>

* Snow Tech stopped just then, he watched as IR rejected his advances, and 
was almost unable to contain his laughter. This guy was so insanely jelouse 
that he didn't relize that he might be making her mad or anything else! What 
a dope! he looks over at Shadow Cat who was standing there saying good bye 
to the bot who had scared her erlier.*

" Sheesh! Some peoples kids, huh Shad?"

* SHadow Cat smiled tolerably at Snow Techs jest to Prowl. She then frowned 
at him, knowing that this was no way a proper way to show they didn't mean 
harm to the over-zelous bot. He was obviously in love with Iron Raptor, but 
would his jelousy and over-protectivness jepordize their relashonship with 
each-other? She knew Iron Raptor well, mabey too well, they had been best 
buds back on the home planet, and Shadow Cat knew She had changed, but she 
hadn't changed too much. If he kept this up, who knows what will happen? 
Mabey she will get mad, or mabey not, who could judge, but one thing was 
certian. If this lover of IR's pulled and crap like the crap he pulled on 
Snow Tech, he would regret it. She might be Ir's friend, but she could only 
take so much crap from some bots.*

* She intervened Snow Techs Awnser to Iron Raptors question of going to 
base. She knew he would just say some thing smart-assed. She side-stepped in 
front of him, facing Iron Raptor.*

"I will fly the walking turd, just give us the directions....."

* She never finished her sentance. Her eyes dimmed and looked into the 
distance, seeing something they other two bots couldn't see. Snow Tech and 
the other little bot had also gone that way. Looking as if they had turned 
into living vegtables. As the nano seconds flew by, a look of dread and 
absalute terror crossed all three faces until they snapped out of it, all 
looking at the two other bots, a mix of feeling flashing across their faces. 
The little bot curled into a ball and began to whimper, and Shadow Cat and 
Snow Tech looked as if they wanted to do the same. Finally Shadow Cat Spoke, 
and hurridely, to Iron Raptor and Prowl,*

" Leave now! Go, they wont find you if you go!!!"

* She began backing away from them, as if the very air they breathed was 
contaminated by an evil force, waving a free hand at them to depart*

" They are here! how.. What did we do wrong?"

* Snow Tech had come up to her and put his arms around her shoulders as she 
shook. He awnsered her softly and soothingly*

" We did nothing wrong. They probally had transmitters implanted in us just 
in case it did happen."

* He sighed and looked at the surrounding jungle.*

" Now where are they?"

* Far away, they trees shook as the terrible machines passed, leaving a wide 
berth of destruction as they passed. Animals fled in their wake, sencing 
that they intended harm. One of the mighty things stopped and swivled its 
head 180 degrees, a light blipped and it spoke to the others,*

<Suspects spotted at nine thousand nano-meres from this location. Suspects 
have with them two unadentified organic/robotic mix creachers. Is this a 
search and destroy mission?>

* A voice spoke from the crowd of others*

< Search and destroy mission confirmed, anniahlate any creachers that the 
suspects have had contact with. Leave no evidence of presance>

* They resumed their travel to the three bots code named Shadow 13, Snow 3 
and Kitt 7.*
